sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FiMapPin, FiHome, FiLayers, FiDroplet, FiUsers, FiCalendar, FiStar, FiWifi, FiCoffee, } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { FaSkiing, FaHotTub, FaParking } from 'react-icons/fa'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import '../styles/ChaletDetailPage.css'; const ChaletDetailPage = () => { // Sample chalet data - in a real app this would come from an API const chalet = { id: 1, title: "Luxury Alpine Chalet with Panoramic Views", images: [ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564013799919-ab600027ffc6', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512917774080-9991f1c4c750', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493809842364-78817add7ffb', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267' ], price: "CHF 2,300,000", pricePerNight: "from €1,100/night", beds: 4, baths: 3, sqft: 2800, status: "Available", address: "Zermatt, Switzerland", type: "Chalet Datcha duplex 8 pers", description: "This stunning luxury chalet offers breathtaking panoramic views of the Matterhorn. Recently renovated with high-end finishes, the property features spacious living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and luxurious bedrooms. Perfect for families or groups looking for an exclusive alpine experience.", features: [ { icon: , name: "Ski-in/Ski-out" }, { icon: , name: "Private hot tub" }, {/* icon: , name: "Wood fireplace" */}, { icon: , name: "High-speed WiFi" }, { icon: , name: "Coffee machine" }, { icon: , name: "Private parking" }, { icon: , name: "Air conditioning" }, { icon: , name: "Sauna" } ], amenities: [ "Fully equipped kitchen", "Home theater system", "Wine cellar", "Ski room with boot warmers", "Mountain view terrace", "Children's play area", "Private chef available", "Daily housekeeping" ], locationDescription: "Located in the exclusive area of Zermatt, just 200m from the ski lifts. The chalet is surrounded by nature while being just a short walk from the village center with its restaurants and shops.", rating: 4.9, reviews: 42, availability: "Year-round", yearBuilt: 2018, floors: 3, contact: { name: "Alpine Luxury Properties", phone: "+41 79 123 45 67", email: "info@alpineluxury.ch" } }; return (
{/* Image Gallery */}
{chalet.images.slice(1, 5).map((img, index) => (
))}
{/* Main Content */}

{chalet.title}

{chalet.address}
{chalet.rating} ({chalet.reviews} reviews)
{/* Price and Status */}
{chalet.price} {chalet.pricePerNight}
{chalet.status}
{/* Quick Facts */}
{chalet.beds} bedrooms
{chalet.baths} bathrooms
{chalet.sqft.toLocaleString()} sqft
Sleeps {chalet.beds * 2}
{chalet.availability}
{/* Description */}

About this chalet

{chalet.description}

{/* Features */}

Chalet Features

{chalet.features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon} {feature.name}
))}
{/* Amenities */}

Amenities

    {chalet.amenities.map((amenity, index) => (
  • {amenity}
    • ))}
{/* Location */}

Location

{chalet.locationDescription}

{/* In a real app, you would embed a map here */}

Map would be displayed here

{/* Contact Form */}

Contact for more information

Or contact directly

{chalet.contact.name}

Phone: {chalet.contact.phone}

Email: {chalet.contact.email}

{/* Booking Sidebar */}

Make an Inquiry

{chalet.price} {chalet.pricePerNight}
Available: {chalet.availability}
{chalet.type}
Sleeps {chalet.beds * 2}
{chalet.sqft.toLocaleString()} sqft
Built in {chalet.yearBuilt}
{chalet.floors} floors
); }; export default ChaletDetailPage;
